Herald of Darkness:
With the help of the forces of darkness can be easily become rich, but you should not forget about its drawbacks. Fame of the clan members who chose the dark power, go down to a minimum. And he who kills one of them, do not go into a chaotic state. Therefore, they often destroy ...
Force of light - the power to make decisions for the good of the common people. The strength that brings glory.
It is still not too late to bet on side of Darkness.
